term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - relative retention, r, in column chromatography
term.title: relative retention

item.text: The ratio of the adjusted or net retention volume (time) or retention factor of a component relative to that of a standard, obtained under identical conditions: r = V R i ' V R st ' = V N i V N may be smaller, larger or identical to unity.

item.alttext: r = V R i ' V R st ' = V N i V N
